description: Night outside the wooden house in Nykarleby. A lone lantern glows through a window while rain begins to fall softly. The messenger departs into the darkness on horseback, carrying Döbeln’s orders toward the waiting regiments.
narration: Through fever and night, command rides onward.
info: Page 4 – Döbeln Sick in Nykarleby. PageType: 4). Scene (panel 4): exterior view, messenger departing into rainy night with Döbeln’s dispatch.
